sen.j: 森 茂好（もり しげよし、1916年（大正5年） - 1991年（平成3年））は、ワキ方宝生流の能楽師。
sen.e: Shigeyoshi MORI (1916 - 1991) was Nohgakushi (Noh actor), waki-kata Hosho-ryu (supporting actors of Hosho school).
Shigeyoshi MORI (1916 - 1991) was a Nohgakushi (Noh actor) playing waki (supporting roles) of Hosho-ryu school.

sen.j: 宝生流十一世宗家宝生新の女婿で、宝生弥一は義兄弟。
sen.e: He was son-in-law of Arata HOSHO, the 11th soke of Hosho-ryu (Hosho school) and his brother-in-law was Yaichi HOSHO.
He was a son-in-law of Arata HOSHO, the 11th head family of Hosho-ryu school and Yaichi HOSHO was his brother-in-law.

sen.j: 重要無形文化財個人指定（人間国宝）。
sen.e: He was designated as a holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).
He was designated as an Individual Holder of Important Intangible Cultural Property (Living National Treasure).

sen.j: その美声と謡の美しさで、能楽界に名声を確立。
sen.e: He established a reputation in the world of Nohgaku for his beautiful voice and the beauty of Utai (the chanting of a Noh text).

sen.j: 国立能楽堂で能『胡蝶』に出演した翌日の1991年2月6日、睡眠中に急逝した。
sen.e: On February 6, 1991, the day after he appeared in the Noh play "Kocho" in National Noh Theatre, he died suddenly during sleep.
